    • countByMonthSince

      @Query(value=" SELECT DATE_FORMAT(c.created_at, \'%Y-%m\') AS ym, COUNT(*) AS qty\n FROM client c\n WHERE c.created_at >= :from\n GROUP BY ym\n ORDER BY ym\n", nativeQuery=true) List<Object[]> countByMonthSince(@Param("from") LocalDateTime from)

    • findRecent

      @Query("SELECT c FROM Client c ORDER BY c.createdAt DESC") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Client> findRecent(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)

    • findRecentClientsWithTotalSpent

      @Query(value=" SELECT c.id_client, c.document, c.name, c.phone, c.email, c.rut,\n c.created_at, c.updated_at, c.address,\n COALESCE(SUM(s.total), 0) as total_spent\n FROM client c\n LEFT JOIN sale s ON s.id_client = c.id_client\n GROUP BY c.id_client, c.document, c.name, c.phone, c.email, c.rut, c.created_at, c.updated_at, c.address\n ORDER BY c.created_at DESC\n LIMIT 10\n", nativeQuery=true) List<Object[]> findRecentClientsWithTotalSpent()

    • findTopSpendingClients

      @Query(value=" SELECT c.id_client, c.document, c.name, c.phone, c.email, c.rut,\n c.created_at, c.updated_at, c.address,\n COALESCE(SUM(s.total), 0) as total_spent\n FROM client c\n LEFT JOIN sale s ON s.id_client = c.id_client\n GROUP BY c.id_client, c.document, c.name, c.phone, c.email, c.rut, c.created_at, c.updated_at, c.address\n ORDER BY total_spent DESC, c.created_at DESC\n LIMIT 10\n", nativeQuery=true) List<Object[]> findTopSpendingClients()

    • countClients

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(c) FROM Client c") long countClients()
